post.title: Our Journey to the DigitalOcean MongoDB Hackathon
post.content:
A few days ago I joined the DigitalOcean MongoDB Hackathon together with a group of friends.

All of us shared a common goal: With the official objective of be awared a prize, we in fact want to learn and explore new technologies which may be useful in our day-to-day job... But first of all we want to have fun!

What are we going to develop and submit to the Hackathon? Stay tuned, I will shed some light very soon...
